title: Orange Chicken
instructions: Cut the planted.chicken into bite-sized pieces and coat lightly with cornstarch.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Fry the planted.chicken pieces until crispy and golden, about 4-5 minutes. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add orange zest, minced garlic, and ginger. Stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Pour in fresh orange juice, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and a touch of brown sugar. Bring to a simmer.
Add a cornstarch slurry to thicken the sauce until it coats the back of a spoon.
Toss the crispy planted.chicken in the sauce until evenly coated.
Serve immediately over steamed rice, garnished with sesame seeds and sliced green onions.
